title: How to find out what the best selling books at Barnes & Noble are - Quora

response.answer_text: Talk to the booksellers. Don’t pay too much attention to the bestseller list; that comes from the publishers and reflects mostly pre-sales to retailers. Example: all of the Harry Potter books. They had strict-on-sale dates, but magically were already national bestsellers. And I recall an instance where our store received a shipment of a brand new bestseller, just released, for $29.95. In the same shipment was a box of the same book with $5.97 bargain stickers. Guess which one sold the most copies?

On their website: Online Bookstore: Books, NOOK ebooks, Music, Movies & Toys, there’s a section (as of this writing, scroll down slightly, it’s on the right-hand side) called “B&N Top 100.” It shows the top 5 on the home page, and has a link to the full Top 100 list. Click and go.
